results.content:
lo malo: va muy rápido y hay que pausarlo mucho, en mi caso mi nivel de ingles y JavaScript no es el mejor y me costo bastante entender. 

lo bueno: ingles perfecto, aprendes cosas que no vi en otros tutoriales de KnockoutJS y por eso se merece min 4 estrella, eso si, 6 minutos de este curso te pueden dar para horas XD

este curso no te lo aconsejo de primeras, deberías tener unas bases de knockoutjs y después ampliar tus conocimientos con este curso, a mi me pareció muy interesante

results.content: I have to slow down the video up to .75 speed just to pause with the coding onscreen. Much better if you don't code fast or switch screens fast for easier comprehension. Thanks anyways for the materials.

results.content: The instructor speaks clearly with no accent and the video is well done. The topics quickly get complex and he goes fast through some sessions but I can watch them again until I get it. I loved his intro into JavaScript...it cleared up a lot and his course sample project works well for this tutorial.

The topics quickly get complex and he goes fast through some sessions but I can watch them again until I get it. I loved his intro into JavaScript...it cleared up a lot and his course sample project works well for this tutorial.

results.content: The author very carefully takes the student through the inter-workings of knockout.js. Although the examples are mostly from for newbies, you will find this as a great introduction to Knockout.js to jump start further development.

results.content:
Learning KnockoutJS is a video course who want to learn and integrate MVVM pattern into their project.

This course begins with introduction to knockoutJS and its various features, also explaining how it simplifies application development. In initial section we see two design patterns closely associated with knockoutjs.

In the section that follows it, we take a look at knockoutjs fundamental stuff like creating model, view and viewmodels. Also displaying data within the model and dynamically binding it.

After that we will be diving deep into advanced topics like data-binding on form, updating models from view, template binding etc.

This course is intended for who have prior knowledge of html, CSS and JS and would like to enhance their skills with knowledge of this MVVm framework.
results.content_html:
Learning KnockoutJS is a video course who want to learn and integrate MVVM pattern into their project.

This course begins with introduction to knockoutJS and its various features, also explaining how it simplifies application development. In initial section we see two design patterns closely associated with knockoutjs.

In the section that follows it, we take a look at knockoutjs fundamental stuff like creating model, view and viewmodels. Also displaying data within the model and dynamically binding it.

After that we will be diving deep into advanced topics like data-binding on form, updating models from view, template binding etc.

This course is intended for who have prior knowledge of html, CSS and JS and would like to enhance their skills with knowledge of this MVVm framework.

results.content: I have learnt a lot about  KnockoutJs by using this awesome course. Thanks a lot for the Author Robert Gaut. If you have ever wanted to create rich, responsive, and dynamic user interfaces without mixing a lot of scripts, this course will give you everything you need to accomplish that goal with Knockout JS and Durandal. Throughout this course you'll learn how to create a "Media Tracking Application" by using KnockoutJs and Durandal. Which is really great.If you have a basic knowledge about Javascript and Html and If you need to learn KnockoutJS then this is the course for you. I highly recommend it to you :)
results.content_html: I have learnt a lot about KnockoutJs by using this awesome course. Thanks a lot for the Author Robert Gaut. If you have ever wanted to create rich, responsive, and dynamic user interfaces without mixing a lot of scripts, this course will give you everything you need to accomplish that goal with Knockout JS and Durandal. Throughout this course you'll learn how to create a "Media Tracking Application" by using KnockoutJs and Durandal. Which is really great.If you have a basic knowledge about Javascript and Html and If you need to learn KnockoutJS then this is the course for you. I highly recommend it to you :)

results.content:
I felt this course was well organized, the content seemed to progress with each section, and I didn't feel overwhelmed at all with the pace. I'm not completely new to JS, but I'm new to KnockoutJS. Well worth the cost, if anything I would like to see some Quiz material added in the future, but still a solid 5/5.

I'm a huge fan of Packt Publishing, and now I found them on my favorite website for learning at my own pace Udemy. This course was the first of many that I have in my wish list, which I typically snag up when there is a large sale.
